title: Name changes
body:
I would love to pull out 10$ worth of rp just to change my name. Currently my ign is: Corgi Dreams and my desired name is: Grool(last game: October 03, 2013), which is a name that believe it or not appeared in my dreams. I was wondering if its possible for that summoner to forfeit that name giving a free name change? I remember seeing a post about how an account stays "Active" for about 6 months, but please share your thoughts about name changes!

Here is what rito posted:
> * Each Summoner Name will have 6 months of inactivity protection upon creation.
* Each Summoner Name will earn an additional month of inactivity protection for each Summoner level above 6
* Inactivity is defined to be a period in which no games of any kind have been played on the account.
* When inactivity protection expires, your name will be available to be claimed through the Summoner Name Change service in the store.

Source: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/25523524-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-#q5

replies.body: The name change must be purchased from the store with the Summoner Name Change item, under the account section of the store.

As that summoner's account is summoner level 7, that means they have 7 months of inactivity protection.
Since October is beyond 7 months, then you should be able to just change your name to that on demand.
